key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges, including a $120 million settlement and permanent ban from federal student loan servicing
Reputational damage from borrower complaints and lawsuits
Dependence on government contracts and vulnerability to policy changes
Operational and financial impact from divestiture and revenue loss
controversies: $120 million settlement with the CFPB for predatory lending and illegal servicing practices
$1.7 billion in private loan cancellations due to lawsuits from state attorneys general
social_issues: Harm to borrowers through high-cost private loans and inadequate servicing
Criticism from advocacy groups and state attorneys general for unethical practices
governance_issues: Regulatory violations and failure to provide adequate support to borrowers
Strategic missteps and reliance on a vulnerable business model
